mapper.select: SELECT top 100 Machine_Name as machine_name ,Additional_Info_1 ,Shot_Number ,Injection_Time ,Filling_Time ,Plasticizing_Time ,Cycle_Time ,Barrel_Temperature_1 ,Barrel_Temperature_2 ,Mold_Temperature_1 ,Mold_Temperature_2 ,Mold_Temperature_3 ,Mold_Temperature_4 ,Mold_Temperature_5 ,Mold_Temperature_6 ,Cavity ,TimeStamp ,FORMAT(TimeStamp, 'HH:mm:ss') as shottime ,FORMAT(TimeStamp, 'yyyyMMdd') as shotdate FROM [ado_kd].[dbo].[shot_data] where FORMAT(TimeStamp, 'yyyyMMdd') between #{frdate} and #{todate} and isnull(Machine_Name,'') Like concat(#{machine_name},'%') and isnull(Additional_Info_1,'') Like concat(#{Additional_Info_1},'%') ORDER BY TimeStamp DESC
